title: Privacy Policy
subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

sections.heading: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect personal information you provide when you book an appointment or contact us (e.g., name, email, phone). We also collect usage data such as IP addresses and pages visited.

sections.heading: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use your information to provide services, communicate appointment details, improve our website, and comply with legal obligations. We never sell your data to third parties.

sections.heading: Sharing Your Information
sections.content: Your data may be shared with service providers who help us run the site (e.g., hosting, email). All partners adhere to strict confidentiality obligations.

sections.heading: Data Security
sections.content: We implement industry-standard measures (encryption, access controls) to protect your data. However, no method is 100% secure.

sections.heading: Your Rights
sections.content: You may review, update, or delete your personal information by contacting us at privacy@medical-center.com.

sections.heading: Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this policy from time to time. The “Last updated” date at the top will change when we do.
